titles.title: Commending the Wake Forest University Demon Deacons field hockey team for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Field Hockey Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Committee on Education and the Workforce discharged.
Consideration initiated by previous order of the House.
Considered by previous order of the House.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 497.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous order of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/4/2004--Passed House without amendment. Commends the Wake Forest University Demon Deacons field hockey team for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Field Hockey Championship.
